name: SPirateS
description:
SPirateS is a free work-in-progress 2D pirate and space exploration RPG. You start your journey with a raft and a sword and swashbuckle your way to be the most feared pirate of the procedurally generated seas .. of space. There are many curiosities along the way for you to uncover, from annoying anthropomorphic cats to heartless cyborgs and brain-hungry zombies.

Feedback

SPirateS is still in its Alpha phase of development. We would appreciate any feedback, such as pointing bugs, weak gameplay elements or any suggestion in our community forums.

You can also directly contact our two-person team of Lefteris Chatzipetrou (lefteris@chpetrou.net) and Manios Krasanakis (maniospas@hotmail.com).
